valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Fri 2 Jan 2026 to 18:00 (UTC) on Sat 3 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low south Baltic sea 974 slow-moving, filling 984 by midday tomorrow. Low just west of Trafalgar 988 expected Trafalgar 991 by same time
